headline: Arch Capital Group Taps Wilqo’s Charlie Platform to Revolutionize Mortgage Lending
summary: Arch Capital Group Ltd. (NASDAQ:ACGL) is one of the 11 most profitable NASDAQ stocks to buy now. On June 2, Arch Capital Group announced a strategic integration with Wilqo’s Charlie platform. This was done through the company’s subsidiary called Arch Mortgage Insurance Company (Arch MI). The partnership aims to streamline the mortgage lending process by […]
